name: Pumpkin Slime Latte
description:
Was late to the jam -made this in about 2.5 days. 

Some cool stuff I made didn't get implemented in time.  Also nly 3 levels at the moment and some bugs -can't fix til after the jam as updates are locked.  <_<

Didn't have time to make a tutorial either but it's pretty simple: Drop a card next to your coffee cup to move that many spaces -smash all the pumpkins and grab the heart if you're feeling fancy.

Art, music, and programming made by Chase of Bass
